website_summaries.verdict: While it's not a no-brainer upgrade over the Mark II, the Canon EOS 5D Mark III is worth the price premium if better performance and configurability matter to you.
pros: The Canon EOS 5D Mark III offers a more streamlined shooting design, significantly updated feature set with more configurability, plus better performance over its predecessor
It maintains its excellent photo and video quality as well
cons: JPEG photos at low ISO sensitivities don't match the generally excellent level of quality that you can otherwise get out of this camera

website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS-1D X Mark II is a pro-grade SLR with a best-in-class shooting rate, a full-frame image sensor, and an extensive lens library.
pros: Dual Pixel AF for smooth Live View and video autofocus

website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS 5D Mark III looks a lot like its predecessor on the outside, but offers plenty of improvements under the hood. It's a solid option for advanced shooters with an investment in Canon glass, but doesn't match the rapid-fire shooting capabilities of the EOS-1D X or Nikon D4.
cons: Slow focus in Live View and Video modes

customer_reviews.title: With the new generation of the 5D series these are and even better deal.
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer, this is hands-down the best portrait camera on the market. Paired with a 70-200 L series lens, the photos are crisp and the background is creamy, making your subject the point of focus. Tack-sharp images and fast! CF card options are so much better than SD options available on the cheaper models. It doesn't offer advanced video functionality, i.e. you have to manually focus videos, but its a still image camera and does so flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It will do everything that I will need it to do and much much more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gore

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Choice, This camera does everything!
customer_reviews.text: Professional level camera with amazing capabilities. Every person who buys this will love it, It does everything. Gorgeous pictures. Excellent quality. We bought this as an upgrade from our Rebel SL1 which is also an excellent camera. This has more functionality for the person who want to increase their photography skills with an upgrade, while still not going into the hideously expensive class. Full Frame, an amazing piece of equipment. All the bells and whistles you want while still being approachable to the amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Messina

customer_reviews.title: In love.
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago, my old Canon 60D died so I decided it was time to upgrade. I don't regret it. I'm in love with this camera and how amazing it is in low light. I've only had it a few weeks, and I can see a difference in my photos. You will not regret buying this camera, I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin E.

customer_reviews.title: VINCORTECH does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: The used Canon 5D Mark 3 arrived on-time and was purchased at an excellent price. Superb value for the money. The camera works well. Extra items were included in the box that were not mentioned in the VINCORTECH ad. There was one minus. The camera's battery door cover would not stay closed. A replacement door cover was purchased ($7.99) and easily replaced. As of today, there are no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Presser

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. Great in low light; higher ISO's not grainy. So glad I pulled the trigger and purchased. Wonder now why I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Canon's perfect workhorse
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to say enough good things about Canon's 5D MK111. It is the ultimate multi-format workhorse shooting both amazing 22 MP photographs and 1080p video. I am a professional photographer shooting still and video images for some of the biggest car companies in the world. I have shot everywhere from Death Valley in Summer to northern Alaska in Winter. Through all these extremes the Canon 5D MK111 has worked flawlessly. Other companies have recently come out with similar cameras that shoot 4k video and have a smaller profile. But the Canon 5D MK111 still stands out as an amazing milestone in camera development. I would buy another one tomorrow if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Dewhurst

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera!!! Moving from my original 7D to the 5D Mark III, pictures with the stock 24 - 105mm lens are excellent! I can't wait to head out with my LS 70 - 200mm lens and shoot!!! The controls have moved around some compared to the two, but I will get it sorted out. Low light and the stock f4 lens, focusing was quick and precise. Having the option of CF or SDHC for storage is great! Thanks to Amazon for this incredible deal also.
customer_reviews.author: Ghengis

customer_reviews.title: Just what you'd expect from Canon
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time Canon user. In my opinion their glass is the best on the market and therefore their camera bodies are a necessity. However their cameras are no slouches either and the mark iii is no exception. Admittedly I've been disappointed by Canon printers and think Canon should stick with what they do best. And that's what they do here with the mark iii. This is just what you'd expect from a pro DSLR. Durable, great auto focus, and love all of the customization it provides. Yes the price point is high but typical for a pro DSLR. Would definitely recommend this camera body for serious pros
customer_reviews.author: mg111

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid impressive low light hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: A truly well designed beautiful camera. I've used all versions of the 5D over the years and its just an incredible camera. The MKIII is no exception, low light capabilities alone make this a stand out. Paired with the right lenses the images are breathtaking. Size would be the only draw back - but that is standard with any camera of this caliber and I now use a Fuji XT1 when the size of the Canon is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: rhodyfresh

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect blend of performance and image quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Canon XS and a Canon 60D prior... and the mkiii is just so perfect for my needs that I doubt I would be willing to upgrade to the mkiv or a 1dx. It is just a perfect fit for what I want to accomplish. I love the machine. I know this review doesn't really discuss the specs and features of the camera, but I will let others handle that. For sports... great... for low light... great... The only thing I don't like about the camera is that my 8mm fisheye lens is too wide... but that's a silly complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it, do it.
customer_reviews.text: If you have been waiting to buy this camera, it's time. I waited over a year. Once I had the money, I pulled the trigger. Easily the best camera on the Canon lineup. I don't like shooting with my MK2 now.... It's that much better. Everything you can think of is about 80% better than the MK2. Seriously. I'm a professional photographer. I think this camera is worth every penny. I want another one now.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Canon Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This camera is one of the best and most dependable Canons I've owned. Thus far, knock on wood, it has performed exceptionally well. So far I think I've fallen in love with the quality of the images I've been able to take with this camera. So far I've owned a Canon XTi, Canon Sci, along with several other Canons and yes this one is hands down the best. The only minor draw back was easily fixed by purchasing a Canon Geosynch unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 5D3, Canon got it right
customer_reviews.text: I had a 5D (original, mark I) and it was OK, actually as my first FF DSLR, it was in its time, a most useful tool. I replaced it with a pair of 5D Mark II bodies, which were an improvement with respect to higher ISO IQ, but the AF was no better than the original. With the 5D3, Canon got it right. Best AF I have ever used and even better high ISO image quality. The 6 fps is an improvement, though I wish it had been the same as the 7D's 8 fps. Bottom line, this is the camera that the 5D2 should have been. Canon got it right!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Airhead Rider

customer_reviews.title: Abe’s is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Abe’s was great. They shipped my Canon 5D Mark III right away and it was all I had wished for. I was originally interested in the Mark IV but for $1,000 less, the Mark III is perfect. I am not a Pro photographer and don’t need all the IV offers. Thanks Abe’s!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a camera!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wait until I had a chance to run the 5DMKIII through the paces. My main interest is in wildlife and some landscape photography. I can't dazzle you with all of the technical jargon but what I do know is this camera can see things the human I cannot. You can shoot a bird at 200 meters and zoom in during post processing and see his eyelashes! It's mind blowing. If you buy this camer, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Bamauroll

customer_reviews.title: Misses are are way less as the auto focus is much better than the 5d Mkll (7d was good in that ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera. I also own the 7d and 5dmkll and this is a noticeable step up. Misses are are way less as the auto focus is much better than the 5d Mkll (7d was good in that area for it's price point). The dynamic range is also improved. Noise? Very negligible even up to over 2000 ISO. Great for low light situations (wedding, event, etc...) and so many ways to customize. I do wish Canon would drop some of the archaic naming of functions (AI Servo for instance) but other than that...excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to the Canon EOS 5D Mark III from a Canon Rebel XTi, and I cannot believe the difference! I thought it was all about the lens, but even with a great lens, I couldn't get that crisp clear shot with my Rebel. My photos are SO clear and sharp with the Mark III. 2 years later, I'm still learning things it can do. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Southern FamilyTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth its price!
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this camera, I had no idea it was so excellent and powerful. Now, I understand why people call it the "beast". I won't repeat here what everybody already knows about the 5D Mark III but I wanted to comment on its capabilities in low light situations. It's just unbelievable! Without any flashes or any external lighting, I'm still able to get usable footage or photos with this thing. Totally worth its price!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ka

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Weeks agonizing over the 5D Mk III or the 6D. I own the 5D Mark II .... I'm not a Pro, but hope my opinion can inform yours. I use glasses, my vision is low and always struggled focusing on the 5D Mk II. Well the new 5D has solve all my issues with a way better focusing system, it works every time and faster even in very very low light conditions plus the new AF points gives me flexibility I always knew I needed it. But it was just not available at the price point of the previous 5D. The design, interface, speed, etc. makes it feel like a whole new model from the next category.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Best Canon Prosumer SLR So Far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Canon Prosumer SLF so far, and frankly speaking probably the best among all the brands. The low-light/high-ISO performance is unbelievable. The color rendering is also remarkable (a tradition of Canon DSLR). The fast continuous shooting speed is very useful for wildlife photography too. Overall, a fantastic portrait/landscape/wildlife DSLR in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Chen

customer_reviews.title: Buy this in a store, not online.
customer_reviews.text: The card reader doesn't work. Contacted support, to no response. Don't buy such an expensive camera on the internet. Buy it in person where you can check that both card readers work. Although for the price, I expected for it to work perfectly. But I Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Silva

customer_reviews.title: I really love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I really checked every camera around. so many things that could be a problem like white balance, etc. But the minute I took this out of the box, i knew it was made for me. I get incredible photos and video's. The color, definition, the white balance, even the weight of the camera. Its so easy to use. You'll never love another camera like this one. I'm glad I didn't get the Nikon and went with the Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Debgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, Awesome!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, I’ve been waiting to upgrade from my crop sensor camera. This camera fits my hands perfect and doesn’t weigh a lot. I can take my photography to the next level and produce clean,sharp pictures for my clients. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: FOTOGUY

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely mindblowing
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a 50D to this camera so you can tell how excited I was to open this up. I started using this with the difficult-to-use 50mm f1.2 lens and it works like a dream. At 1.2, nailing the shot is a breeze (even from far away) with its flawless focusing system. I'm a bokeh freak so nailing shots at f1.2 perhaps 98% of the time is fantastic. I've been practicing with an f1.4 for 2-3 years so skill might have helped, but that feeling you get after getting the shot wonderfully in focus on the first try is the best.
customer_reviews.author: asnagpal

customer_reviews.title: Hate to sound cliche
customer_reviews.text: I graduated from the Canon 7D to this. Hate to sound cliche, but my photography skills have increased, and the full frame view is such an awesome factor. The focus is ALWAYS spot on. The 7D button layout is a lot similar to the 5DIII, so I didn't have any issues learning how to handle it. I use the 35L with it almost full-time, and the Sigma 70-200 f/2.8 OS when I'm looking for extra reach. I love this camera; it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ms_Ladi

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a long time for this camera and after a long anticipation, heart pumping and nerve wracking, I finally got it. If you don't have one, please get it fast. I have never seen such technology and if you think the Mark II is great, you haven't seen anything yet. Customer service was excellent; they email to make sure the product reach and everything was in good order. Now tell me, what more can you ask for? please don't' hesitate, get yourself one, it worth the price and the seller got a thumbs up... A++++
customer_reviews.author: Newton G. Grayson

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with this body
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my international trips. I am really happy with this body. I take a lot of night shots and it has the high ISO I need to take beautiful shots. I have not regretted buying this.
customer_reviews.author: A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera. It can be a bit daunting to pay so much for a camera, but you will not regret it. This camera performs extremely well in low light. I've been testing it against a Canon 70D that I bought a few months ago as I became a more serious photographer. Even though the 70D is newer, the low light images on the 5D Mark III are much better. Something about being a full frame camera allows more light to hit the sensor and just makes low light photos extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: R. Certain

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need 50MP sensor on the 5dS.  Remember folks, bigger is not always better.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 7D which is discontinued, to the 5Dmk3, and of course, FF sensor. Massive upgrade in sensor/camera/quality vs my original 7D. I went with this one vs the 5Ds because I wanted the faster frame per second for motorsports that this offers. In other words, its closer to the 8FPS as the 7D.
customer_reviews.author: JX

customer_reviews.title: Could not find any issues after 5 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have thought hard and long between D800 and this one. Despite D800 having better resolution, I do print in large size, I was very much worried about the left focus issues and dust/oil specks on D800. I have talked to D800 owners and found out about their experiences. As my first and only full frame camera, I wanted to get a very reliable dependable one. And so far 5D3 has delivered. Auto focus is flawless, I am yet to miss the first one. Since then I also bought nifty fifty 1.4 and 100mm macro L lens. I already had 70-300mm DO lens, I feel I can handle just about every situation. I strongly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: The best equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mark iii and I love this equipment. I am a missionary photographer and use two of these cameras. If you want the best results, buy the best equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS 5D Mark III
customer_reviews.text: We already have the Canon EOS 5D full frame camera and thought this would be a great step up and it is. Just wish some of the EF-S lens would fit it. It takes great pictures whether scenery, flowers, people, etc. We only use the L series lenses and with the combination of that and the camera the quality of the pictures cannot be beat. It was well worth the money we had to spend to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMom315

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big investment that is worth every penny. The photos are outstanding and the multiple options allow you to shoot in just about in light. I had the 5D Mark II and am glad to have purchased this camera to be able to have the additional features. I love the built in HDR. I would highly recommend this camera with the L lens.
customer_reviews.author: nc911

customer_reviews.title: What can I say that hasn't been said?
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a T3i, which I loved as my 1st DSLR, and as soon as I looked thru the view finder I fell in love. I am keeping the T3i as a second camera and it will be hard to use it after only a couple hours of playing with the Mark iii. I am in LOVE! Already photos at iso 8000 on the Mark iii look better than photos on my T3i look at iso 800. Although the photo at iso 8000 on the Mark iii is soft, but for events in low light I would still call the photos usable. If you can swing the $$$$ this is the camera to have!
customer_reviews.author: Karp

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, great camera
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're going into the 1d world this is the premier Canon full-frame camera, and it completely meets my expectations in that regard. I need (and use) the autofocus performance that comes with this level of spending -- if you don't, the 6D has every bit the image quality but a much-nicer price. Either way you can't go wrong in the Canon line for a quality full-frame camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tickerguy

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to myself in YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I was using a much older canon model (I won't even say which one because its mildly embarrassing.) Now, I don't have to rent it and my photography business can grow! Hooray for Canon! Yep. I said Hooray. Deal with it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine, except the charger that was included ended up being counterfeit and stopped working after awhile. Seller was cordial until I asked to exchange and then they became unprofessional. I will say that the time period for an exchange had passed, which was my mistake but I would expect a more professional response to my misunderstanding.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: YOU ALREADY KNOW HOW GOOD THIS CAMERA IS
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking of buying this camera, you most likely already know what it is capable of. It changed my wedding videography business and put the look and feel of my shots on a whole new level. Be sure to buy the Amazon Basics package if it's still available. It has an extra 32GB memory card, Tri-pod, and Backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Davis

customer_reviews.title: My first full frame is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from 60D. This camera takes absolutely stunning photos. You can't go wrong with this full frame camera if you like to take photos. 22.3MP is perfect for me, there is sufficient cropping when I need to. I use a 64GB SD and I can take over 1000 photos and I never fill up 64GB in one day. However, I do not like the price of the body drop so much within a year. It has depreciated 15% in less than a year. I think Canon had priced it too high at launch.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCar

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but incredible
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's expensive, but the full frame and quality behind the camera make it worth every penny. I've taken mine to 25+ countries and hope to travel to even more. It's survived a dust storm in the African desert without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: A MASTERPIECE camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera exceeded my expectations. I bought this product advised by Tony Nothrup. A great upgrade from my Canon T3i, for those who are serious into photography, quality and detail. Not recommended for first time photographers -- Recommend to start out with Canon T3i or equivalent, and once when you are completely mastered with T3i's functions and become frustrated with its limitation, then either Canon 6D or Canon 5D Mark III is for you. I recommend reading Tony Nothrup's books before purchasing any cameras. I am still falling into love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for several months and I love it! It was a substantial upgrade from the Xti that I had previously. Shutter speed is fast - good for most occasions. I shoot HS sports and it is fine. Low light sensitivty is great - i get better noise performance at 3200 ISO than the xit at 400. Still learning al the capabilities but so far - really glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. This camera does everything I ask of it and produces beautiful photos (assuming I do my part). The controls are different from my 7D and I'm still trying to get used to them. The only 'problem' I've found is that the camera does not seem to compensate for the polarizing filter when I'm using a flash in ettl mode and the camera in 'P' mode. Not a big deal for most situations but has cause me problems when photographing art.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T

customer_reviews.title: A Stellar Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 5D MkIII. Can't say enough about it. Canon's spectacular photographic imagery has become a given, but the video capabilities put it over the top for a camera in this price range. In addition to photography, I use it for B-roll next to a Sony PMW-EX3 ($8500), and usually, I'm trying to get the Sony footage to match up to the Canon in post.
customer_reviews.author: K. Coste

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over the Mark ii and great amazon service
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that has not been reviewed about this camera here. From very good reviews to the extremely stupid complaints from some people! The camera it's just great!! It is $300 more that a some sellers on ebay but if you end up having one of those few issues with the packing, camera or lens those ebay sellers are not going to take care of you like Amazon will. For me that is worth the extra $300.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Just love it! :)
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal camera...completely reawakened my interest in photography. I held off writing a review, so I could have some experience with it before commenting. I have no complaints...it's easy to understand why this camera is so popular and highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Jay in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Precise Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera and took it to Paris with my wife over Christmas 2012. Was able to easily obtain outstanding nighttime photos without a tripod or flash. Back home for fast moving subjects (children playing or sports) it focuses extremely fast and allows one to get great photos with just a quick press of the shutter release. An excellent camera! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MHSvz32

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I know there are hundreds of other reviews for this camera already, so I'll keep mine short and sweet. I absolutely love my mark III. It really does it all with tack sharp focus, an amazing sensor in low light, and tons and tons of great features. It's head and shoulders above my 6D!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day
customer_reviews.text: Needed a secondary camera for a wedding last minute and it came through for me, and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately not worth any stars. I received a used scratched camera instead of the new one I had ordered. The battery was still inserted in camera. Didn’t even bother testing it. Disappointed. Not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands a professional photographer. Best price in town but most importantly- camera works great .
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Goin' on years.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this a couple years ago and its still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Karisch

customer_reviews.title: A work or art...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it alot yet but, much as I love my Mark II (I still have it....and will for the foreseeable future), the AF is an incredible improvement....so fast and accurate. A learning experience though, but I'm okay with that. Lots of other improvements as well (I'm still figuring them all out)....some of which affect more the jpeg side of things (that one would usually deal with when processing the raw photo). I'm very glad I made the upgrade. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: JohnR

customer_reviews.title: The best DSLR!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best DSLR (not only by Canon) so far, except for the Canon 1D-X. I bought it as a complement to my Canon 7D, but it is quite a different thing altogether. AF and ISO are the two features where this camera especially shines. As a result, IQ is far, far better. I've used this camera with the kit lens 24-105 f/4, with the 70-200 f/2.8, 70-200 f/4, 100-400 f/4.5-5.6 and every time its performance has been flawless. I absolutely love the Canon 5D Mark III.
customer_reviews.author: David Miko

customer_reviews.title: and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Camera came exactly as described, and works like a charm. Quick shipping and great packaging. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: This the best camera I have owned till date
customer_reviews.text: This the best camera I have owned till date. The photos are stunning right out of the camera. If you can afford it, skip all the crop sensor bodies and go straight to this one. You will not be disappointed. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: avidonlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great! The 24-105 lens is super versatile. My package arrived quickly, and everything seems to be working perfectly. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Focus didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time and looked a little more worn than I expected. Could not get focus to work through the viewfinder after talking to a professional who tried to calibrate it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: In great shape. Just tried today and works great. All accessories were nice.
customer_reviews.author: jazztiggers

customer_reviews.title: Sensational camera
customer_reviews.text: Have thought about upgrading from a 7D and finally did. The 5D is so much better that we are amazed. Worth every penny and I have be buying this line since the 20 D. Coupled with the L lenses it improves the quality of the photos to an extent that I never thought was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McAuliffe

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from a canon rebel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to upgrade to a full-frame camera. I've rented the 5D mark iii camera from Borrow Lenses and was very pleased with it. I'm happy to be shooting full-frame, although sometimes I still use my rebel T1i.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: ... IS L4 zoom lens and the two make a perfect pair for capturing super sharp
customer_reviews.text: This camera was ordered along with Canon's new 100-400 IS L4 zoom lens and the two make a perfect pair for capturing super sharp, hand-held close-ups. I now have two 5DIIIs, the other paired with the 24-104 L4 lens. I'm finding that these two sets are the perfect combinations for my travel photography. I also carry along the 1.4 III extender, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Fischl

customer_reviews.title: It's like my 7d on Steroids
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far, great upgrade from my 7d (Non full frame). the 24-105 lens on this camera actually is a good low light lens compared to the same lens on my 7d. Nice sturdy build and outstanding pics, also the HDR mode works nicely also.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price...!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that is in great condition as described by the seller.. I’m still trying it and hopefully become a keeper..!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love it
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived earlier than expected. Love the extra features this camera has over the 60D like the low light shooting and going to a higher resolution without the grain. Was a little disappointed that I didn't think about the lenses that I already had and about 1/2 are not full frame. Other than that(which is no big deal) I love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: laidbackaz

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this camera. It is the go too for any photographer or videographer in the industry. Take advantage of all the rebates that Canon has when making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brent U

customer_reviews.title: What can I say
customer_reviews.text: It is a 5D Mark III...it is everything it is cracked up to be. I will shoot more video on this than I will stills. Great camera. If you don't want to spend $3400.00...get the 6D especially if you are only going to shoot video.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Like anything else
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these cameras. Great camera. Like anything else, they can have problems, it comes with the territory. So recommend a good extra insurance coverage on it. We've been taken good care of each time it has been needed.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: I Wish Instructions Came With This...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would easily take on to this camera...NOPE! WHY didn't anyone say ALOT about the AF?!? But I am DETERMINE to master this camera! This camera separates the weekend warriors from the professionals!
customer_reviews.author: J.Rene

customer_reviews.title: amazing body i think i will keep it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing body i think i will keep it for the next 10 years and won't need an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN

customer_reviews.title: 5d home run
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, very similar image quality to 5d2 with a sophisticated AF system. I can't write anything you can't read on a review site other than coming from a 5d2 it was completely worth the upgrade. Many more successful photos due to the better AF and the camera is just much quicker overall.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: WOW !!
customer_reviews.text: From the amazing low light, low noise, high ISO performance to the 61 point autofocus system, this camera Rocks! Get one if you can, You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. You can't go wrong with Canon Mark series. I do professional wedding video and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: You can count on this camera when you need it ...
customer_reviews.text: You can count on this camera when you need it most. I have found this to be my most reliable camera I have ever owned. At last check it had over 200K shutter clicks with no problem! I still use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Will Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing camera -- with a truck load of features
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera -- with a truck load of features. My photography has already improved an hundred fold. Still, I am not up to speed with all the features yet.
customer_reviews.author: Noel W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast
customer_reviews.text: There's just something about the way the full frame censor captures an image that's very aesthetically pleasing. The quality of stills are wonderful even when I have to bump up ISO. The camera's video quality is also a huge selling point. Its versatility and sturdy body makes the 5D Mark III a good DSLR for any situation.
customer_reviews.author: vo.anabelle

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded from a Canon 40d which was a good camera. This 5D Mark III is head and ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even begun to try the wide range of features this camera has. I upgraded from a Canon 40d which was a good camera. This 5D Mark III is head and shoulders above it. I'm tickled.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeee my camera!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeeee my camera! Shutter count was extremely low! And I would recommend anyone get this camera! I’m currently not classified as a beginner anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Euriah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worked really hard to afford this pro camera. Made ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really hard to afford this pro camera. Made a huge difference with my glass from the Canon 40D to this. Purchased from Amazon instead of local because of the extended warranty offer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: best camera
customer_reviews.text: King of canon full frame camera love it I sale 6D buy this one really awesome
customer_reviews.author: Suman Rana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camera and lens combination. I'm still learning all there is about it capabilities but and VERY pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Calland

customer_reviews.title: This camera is FANTASTIC, takes beautiful photos even before editing
customer_reviews.text: This camera is FANTASTIC, takes beautiful photos even before editing. My wife is a photographer... I know very little about photography but much of her work is editing and I thought that the quality of camera wouldn't matter much with as detailed as gets in the editing. I couldn't have been more wrong. She still edits, but I would say her time spent is cut considerably, at least by half if not more. Price is high, but for the quality of camera I don't think it could be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for a great price on Amazon. I have been into photography for a while and wanted to upgrade to a full frame, and wow I'm glad I chose this one. Stunning photos and great detail... This will be a joy to use for the next few years!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: As a low budget filmmaker, this is still the best investment I ever made. And I continue to discover things it can do. Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from a 5D MK II, and we are never looking back. The biggest asset of this machine is by far its auto-focus system, all 61 focal points, and then the different manner in which you can set them up. Also worth is the almost no noise at high ISO, superb addition, great machine. Would buy it over againl
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alomia

customer_reviews.title: Still strong after all these years.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality used camera from a trustworthy seller. Tons of features, great image quality, and can still hold its own against the modern competition.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Pi Man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up my 2nd 5D mk iii. This is a great camera. It's ability to shoot in dark situations with minimal noise is amazing. The image quality is superb. I highly recommend this camera for all advanced or professional photographers.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Canon 5DMKII Kit
customer_reviews.text: Typical Canon quality with a great AF system. I purchased the 5DMKIII with the 24-105F/4L It's a great kit for the price and offers excellent image quality with a really nice walk around lens that doubles as a macro. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever owned! Unless Canon comes out with a Mark IV that shoots 4k raw video in the near future, it will be a while before I upgrade. Add Magic Lantern to this camera, along with the fastest SD or CF card you can get and you truly unlock the potential of this little beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clarity
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Canon camera since 2011. I have several including the 1ds and the Mark ll. The Mark lll is by far my favorite. The auto white balance works great and the clarity of my shots is awesome. It is a very noticeable difference. I highly recommend this camera to professionals and to serious hobbyists.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Williams Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading the 5Dc to the 5D MIII was a huge step. Two main reasons I upgrade: The low light performance rocks. Auto-focus is incredible. I shoot mostly stills but also pleased with the video performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Conner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding camera
customer_reviews.text: I thought the 5D Mark II was great until I got the 5D Mark III. Top quality all the way around. Focus accuracy and speed are amazing. I especially like the locking mode dial, so I don't get the wrong mode set accidentally anymore. Glad I have Canon gear.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bernskoetter

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's a Cannon
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera! I would buy it again. I love it. It's a Cannon...what can I say.
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! I purchased this camera about a year ago and I love this product! This was an investment for me and because of the price point I watched and reviewed several videos and photos from different sites. After about 3 months of research, I purchased this product and I shoot Canon only now. I do most of the work within the camera itself, so the photos i'm attaching to this review have very little editing. Photo Credit: Scott Warren -This will give you an idea of what you can expect from this camera! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Warren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I've read several comments, posts and articles about this camera, specially about the reduced noise at higher ISOs. It’s true. For me, this is a real gain, because if you photograph in door at evening (even using prime lenses, e.g. 1.2 or 1.4) you need to increase the ISO to keep reasonable shutter speed (1/125). Usually, the result is grainer/noisier. This 5D keeps very nice result up to ISO 1600.
customer_reviews.author: Martim Ramos Cavalcanti

customer_reviews.title: Always check used equipment before using it.
customer_reviews.text: It came with a problem, you can’t take out the battery, I am new to cameras so I didn’t think it was a big deal but it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: It has all been said....
customer_reviews.text: One of the best moves I have made in recent memory. Canon took an "L" lens and included it as a 'kit' lens for the 5D mark III at a lower price than buying both individually. Not much else to say. Custom Function now allows up to 7 bracketed shots automatically. For HDR, how can you go wrong. Much less ISO noise than the 5D Mark II. A quieter mode for shooting discretely weddings in a church or on a spy mission, no that's another life. FAST burst speed. Nothing left to say buy WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product..i have a 5Dmarkii already so the step up to the Mark iii is an easy one..very very satisfied with the transaction and quick delivery..thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: stephen cyr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bird Photography
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade from my 5D Mark II. The greatly increased number of AF points makes this a great camera for bird photography, especially for capturing birds in flight. There are so many options of how to set the AF points, that I ordered Art Morris' guide to the 5D Mark III as a good starting point.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Carnahan

product_meta.title: Canon EOS 5D Mark III 22.3 MP Full Frame CMOS with 1080p Full-HD Video Mode Digital SLR Camera (Body)
product_meta.description: Style:Body Only| Configuration:BaseThe Canon 5260B002 EOS 5D Mark III 22.3MP Digital SLR Camera Body (lens required and sold separately) with supercharged EOS performance and full frame, high-resolution image capture is designed to perform. Special optical technologies like 61-Point High Density Reticular AF and extended ISO range of 100-25600 make this it ideal for shooting weddings in the studio, out in the field and great for still photography. Professional-level high definition video capabilities includes a host of industry-standard recording protocols and enhanced performance that make it possible to capture beautiful cinematic movies in EOS HD quality. A 22.3 Megapixel full-frame Canon CMOS sensor, Canon DIGIC 5+ Image Processor, and shooting performance up to 6.0fps provide exceptional clarity and sharpness when capturing rapidly-unfolding scenes. Additional technological advancements include an Intelligent Viewfinder, Canon's advanced iFCL metering system, High Dynamic Range (HDR), and Multiple Exposure.
feature_bullets: 61-point AF system. Image type : JPEG, RAW (14-bit Canon original), RAW + JPEG simultaneous recording enabled
1080p HD video recording with manual controls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars827 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
